name: Profind (Find a product)
description: Create an application that fits-up the all the scenarios and or could make purchasing goos online from e-commerce experience from great to wow by remaining on only one desktop or mobile-based app.

name: Hashedin Projects
description: Build a portal where employees can log in to see a breakdown of requirements for each project. They should be able to apply to open positions and check status of their request.

name: New Joinee Onboarding Tool
description: Create an application which can track status of new joiners into the system and inform the next steps invovled in the onboarding of the employee.

name: Co-working space
description: Build an application where interested employees can identify nearest co-working spaces and reserve seats with their colleagues or for self. The firm shall reimburse them for the charges incurred.

name: Covid seating
description: Build an application where interested employees can view the attendance sheet for an upcoming day and secure a seat based on their preference.

name: Cross skilling app OR Mentoring App
description: Build an application for employees to gain new skill set in their ideal time whilst helping other PM during the time of resource crunch.

name: Virtual marathons
description: Build an application for fitness enthusiast to compete virtually for running & cycling events.

name: Hashedin team Gaming/Challenges platform
description: Build a portal where emplyees can log in and see all upcoming challenges. They should be able to enroll for any upcoming challenges. Show user profile & Scores.

name: Hobby groups app in companies
description: Build a portal where employees can enroll and socialize.
